txt.en: You have burned many of the slain at Ondoher's Folly and prevented the Orcs from further defiling their remains.
Many sacrifices have been made at Ondoher's Folly, and the slain of Gondor and lands beyond are mutilated and left to rot in the heavy air of Dagorlad.
It was a sorry fate that befell those slain at Ondoher's Folly, but no longer can the Orcs of Mordor defile and mock them in death.
Burned the remains of the slain at Ondoher's Folly ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Burn the remains of the slain at Ondoher's Folly ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Defiled remains can be found throughout Ondoher's Folly, in north-western Dagorlad.\n\nYou have discovered the grim remains of many slain prisoners and slaves at Ondoher's Folly. You should burn them before the Orcs can defile them further.

An acrid scent permeates the air as you explore Ondoher's Folly. The Orcs of Mordor have seemingly left the remains of their sacrifices strewn about the encampment to rot.\n\nA burial within the lands of the Enemy seems an unlikely task, so you resolve to burn the dead before the Orcs can further dishonour them.
